original_text:
Like one who takes away a garment on a cold day,
    or like vinegar poured on a wound,
    is one who sings songs to a heavy heart.
korean_text: 마음이 상한 자에게 노래하는 것은 추운 날에 옷을 벗음 같고 소다 위에 식초를 부음 같으니라

sentences.original_text: Like one who takes away a garment on a cold day
sentences.korean_translation: 추운 날 옷을 벗기는 사람 같고

sentences.original_text: or like vinegar poured on a wound
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 상처에 식초를 부은 것 같으니

sentences.original_text: is one who sings songs to a heavy heart
